4313930.name: Crime City Center
4313930.description:
Crime City Center: Blend into the Crowd or Maintain Order!

Crime City Center is an online action game featuring low-poly graphics, playable with 4 to 20 players, where strategy, deception, and tension intertwine. There are two sides in this city: Criminals creating chaos and Police maintaining order.

Choose Your Side:

CRIMINALS: Live in the Shadows Your mission is simple but dangerous: Complete tasks around the city (ATM robbery, car theft, pickpocketing). However, there is a catch: You have no weapons. To survive, you must mimic NPCs.

  • Stealth is Key: Act like an ordinary citizen to avoid getting caught by the police.

  • Risk and Reward: Every time you commit a crime, your location is revealed on the minimap for 3 seconds. Be quick and lose your trail.

  • Communication: Whisper plans with nearby accomplices using proximity chat, but be careful; your voice fades away as you get farther apart.

POLICE: Be the Hunter, Not the Prey Your mission is to detect and neutralize criminals. Everyone in the city is a suspect.

  • Technological Superiority: See other police officers constantly on the minimap, and spot criminals instantly when they commit a crime.

  • Radio Communication: Communicate with other officers from anywhere on the map with a radio effect, or use the "V" key to project your voice and interrogate nearby suspects directly.

  • Sharpshooting: Your ammo is limited (Number of Criminals + 2). If you shoot the wrong person or run out of ammo, you are out of the game. Every shot is vital.

Game Rules:

  • Race Against Time: Survive in rounds lasting up to 20 minutes.

  • Victory Conditions:

    • Criminals Win: If time runs out and at least one criminal is still alive, OR if all police officers die.

    • Police Win: If all criminals are caught/neutralized before time runs out.
